data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Plumaroides Brothers, 1974 (Hymenoptera: Chrysidoidea, Plumariidae) from Argentina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Diez, Patricia A., Fidalgo, Patricio (2012): Two new species of the genus Plumaroides Brothers, 1974 (Hymenoptera: Chrysidoidea, Plumariidae) from Argentina. Zootaxa 3188: 64-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280021
